pages.text: The $(item)Handheld Water Purifier$() is a tool that allows players to convert $(water)Water$() into $(water)Purified Water$().$(br2)To use the handheld purifier, hold a fluid container in your offhand and target a water source block or fluid tank and hold [$(k:use)].$(br2)After a short duration, the purifier will attempt to drain
$(br)one bucket of water from the source and fill the offhand container item with an equal amount of $(water)Purified Water$().
